overview: A filmmaker in search of his father, who joined the MRTA rebels when he was only one year old. As an adult he sets out on his trail, a track that will take him from Berlin to Stockholm and from there to Lima. What kind of man, political agitator, terrorist, what kind of father is the prisoner Peter Cárdenas Schulte, a.k.a. "Alejandro"?
title: Alias Alejandro
